changeSet.author: stranger
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE orders ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY , user_id BIGINT, product_id BIGINT, order_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, expire_at timestamp , address_id BIGINT, quantity INT, status_id BIGINT, total_price VARCHAR(255), payment_method_id BIGINT, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products (id), FOREIGN KEY (address_id) REFERENCES address (id), FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status (id), FOREIGN KEY (payment_method_id) REFERENCES payment_method (id) )
